deploy.startCommand: echo 'Container started' && echo 'PORT=$PORT' && python --version && python -c 'import django; print(f"Django {django.VERSION}")' && python manage.py check && echo 'Django check passed' && python manage.py migrate && echo 'Migrations done' && gunicorn backend.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8000} --workers 1 --log-level debug
